trans-unit.source: Click here to go to step one of the five-step submission process.
trans-unit.target: Click here to go to step one of the five-step submission process.

trans-unit.source: You can complete this submission at a later date by selecting Active Submissions from the Author home.
trans-unit.target: You can complete this submission at a later date by selecting Active Submissions from the Author home.

trans-unit.source: This journal is not accepting submissions at this time.
trans-unit.target: This journal is not accepting submissions at this time.

trans-unit.source: Please consider waiving the Article Submission Fee for this article
trans-unit.target: Please consider waiving the Article Submission Fee for this article

trans-unit.source: Please use the comments box below to indicate why fees should be waived.
trans-unit.target: Please use the comments box below to indicate why fees should be waived.

trans-unit.source: If you are applying for a waiver, you must enter a reason in the space provided.
trans-unit.target: If you are applying for a waiver, you must enter a reason in the space provided.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this incomplete submission?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this incomplete submission?

trans-unit.source: Articles must be submitted to one of the journal's sections.
trans-unit.target: Articles must be submitted to one of the journal's sections.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure all items in the submission checklist are satisfied before continuing.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure all items in the submission checklist are satisfied before continuing.

trans-unit.source: The authors agree to the terms of this Copyright Notice, which will apply to this submission if and when it is published by this journal (comments to the editor can be added below).
trans-unit.target: The authors agree to the terms of this Copyright Notice, which will apply to this submission if and when it is published by this journal (comments to the editor can be added below).

trans-unit.source: You must agree to the terms of the Copyright Notice before continuing.
trans-unit.target: You must agree to the terms of the Copyright Notice before continuing.

trans-unit.source: Please select an appropriate journal section for this submission.
trans-unit.target: Please select an appropriate journal section for this submission.

trans-unit.source: Reorder authors to appear in the order they will be listed on publication.
trans-unit.target: Reorder authors to appear in the order they will be listed on publication.

trans-unit.source: Provide terms for indexing the submission; separate terms with a semi-colon (term1; term2; term3).
trans-unit.target: Provide terms for indexing the submission; separate terms with a semi-colon (term1; term2; term3).

trans-unit.source: Refers to geo-spatial location, chronological or historical coverage, and/or characteristics of research sample.
trans-unit.target: Refers to geo-spatial location, chronological or historical coverage, and/or characteristics of research sample.

trans-unit.source: At least one author is required.
trans-unit.target: At least one author is required.

trans-unit.source: The first name, last name, and email address of each author is required.
trans-unit.target: The first name, last name, and email address of each author is required.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the title of your article.
trans-unit.target: Please enter the title of your article.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the abstract of your article.
trans-unit.target: Please enter the abstract of your article.

trans-unit.source: You have exceeded the maximum word limit for abstracts in this section's track.
trans-unit.target: You have exceeded the maximum word limit for abstracts in this section's track.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading a submission file?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading a submission file?

trans-unit.source: This optional step allows Supplementary Files to be added to a submission. The files, which can be in any format, might include (a) research instruments, (b) data sets, which comply with the terms of the study's research ethics review, (c) sources that otherwise would be unavailable to readers, (d) figures and tables that cannot be integrated into the text itself, or other materials that add to the contribution of the work.
trans-unit.target: This optional step allows Supplementary Files to be added to a submission. The files, which can be in any format, might include (a) research instruments, (b) data sets, which comply with the terms of the study's research ethics review, (c) sources that otherwise would be unavailable to readers, (d) figures and tables that cannot be integrated into the text itself, or other materials that add to the contribution of the work.

trans-unit.source: Click Save to upload file (after which additional files can be uploaded).
trans-unit.target: Click Save to upload file (after which additional files can be uploaded).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading the supplementary file you have chosen?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading the supplementary file you have chosen?

trans-unit.source: No supplementary files have been added to this submission.
trans-unit.target: No supplementary files have been added to this submission.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this supplementary file?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this supplementary file?

trans-unit.source: To index this supplementary material, provide the following metadata for the uploaded supplementary file.
trans-unit.target: To index this supplementary material, provide the following metadata for the uploaded supplementary file.

trans-unit.source: Present file to reviewers (without metadata), as it will not compromise blind review.
trans-unit.target: Present file to reviewers (without metadata), as it will not compromise blind review.

trans-unit.source: Use only with formally published materials.
trans-unit.target: Use only with formally published materials.

trans-unit.source: Date when data was collected or instrument created.
trans-unit.target: Date when data was collected or instrument created.

trans-unit.source: Name of study or other point of origin.
trans-unit.target: Name of study or other point of origin.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the title of this supplementary file.
trans-unit.target: Please enter the title of this supplementary file.

trans-unit.source: Public supplemental file identification already exists.
trans-unit.target: Public supplemental file identification already exists.

trans-unit.source: To submit your manuscript to {$journalTitle} click Finish Submission. The submission's principal contact will receive an acknowledgement by email and will be able to view the submission's progress through the editorial process by logging in to the journal web site. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$journalTitle}.
trans-unit.target: To submit your manuscript to {$journalTitle} click Finish Submission. The submission's principal contact will receive an acknowledgement by email and will be able to view the submission's progress through the editorial process by logging in to the journal web site. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$journalTitle}.

trans-unit.source: No files have been attached to this submission.
trans-unit.target: No files have been attached to this submission.

trans-unit.source: Submission complete. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$journalTitle}.
trans-unit.target: Submission complete. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$journalTitle}.

trans-unit.source: A user account is required to submit to this journal. This allows our editors to track your submissions and contact you when the status of your submission changes, or if additional information is required from you.
trans-unit.target: A user account is required to submit to this journal. This allows our editors to track your submissions and contact you when the status of your submission changes, or if additional information is required from you.
